basic_data.cell_line_alt_name: TRPV4 p.P799L; MCRIi001-A-2-TRPV4 p.P799L; PB001-SOX9tdTOM-TRPV4pP799L; SOX9tdTom TRPV4 p.P799L

publications.title: CRISPR/Cas9 gene editing of a SOX9 reporter human iPSC line to produce two TRPV4 patient heterozygous missense mutant iPSC lines, MCRIi001-A-3 (TRPV4 p.F273L) and MCRIi001-A-4 (TRPV4 p.P799L)
Developmental principles informing human pluripotent stem cell differentiation to cartilage and bone
Chondrogenic Differentiation of Human-Induced Pluripotent Stem Cells
CRISPR/Cas9 gene editing of a SOX9 reporter human iPSC line to produce two TRPV4 patient heterozygous missense mutant iPSC lines, MCRIi001-A-3 (TRPV4 p.F273L) and MCRIi001-A-4 (TRPV4 p.P799L)

genomic_modifications.description: Heterozygous TRPV4 (c.2396C>T; p.Phe799Leu) variant was introduced to TRPV4. Synonymous changes were also introduced.

genomic_characterisation.summary: Molecular karyotyping by SNP array (Illumina Infinium CoreExome-24 v1.1; resolution 0.5 Mb). SNPduo comparison to parental cell (>99.9% identity).

ethics.institutional_HREC: Human Research Ethics Committee of the Royal Children's Hospital
